meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Josh Powell Andy Holt Ariel Schneider Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6035.

td.p: Josh Powell, a phone-based health coach from San Diego, California
Andy Holt, a biotech account manager from Garner, North Carolina
Ariel Schneider, a biology student from West Lafayette, Indiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $46,300)

tr.td: THE NEW TESTAMENT
TV SITCOMS BY FAMILY
(Alex: We'll give you the families.)
REGION-ISMS
GREEN FOOD
HOLE
IN THE "O" ZONE
